labels.scene_description: A formal United States Declaration of Intention document for Esther Diana Capuano, dated 1938. It features a small black and white identification photograph of a woman in her mid-30s with a waved hairstyle, attached to the bottom left corner. The document is filled with typewritten personal history, including her birth in Rhodes and arrival in the US in 1912.
